title: ISic030036. ISic030036
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΡΙΣΤΟ̄Ι
2ΕΠΙΕΙΚΗΣ
3ΦΑΥΛΛΟ̄
4[.]ΡΙΣΤΟ̄
5ΜΑΤΡ[···]
6[---]ΙΑΣ

4: orig. ΡΙΣΤΟ̄

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena.

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

4-5. Incised upside down and probably added later; ΡΙΣΤΟ, tablet; Ἀριστο̄́ι (not identical to A. of L. 1, whose descent is not specified) plus patronymic (either Μάτρ[ο̄] from Μᾶτρος or Μάτρ[ιος] from Μᾶτρις) or matronymic (Ματρ[οῦς] from Ματρο̄́ι). (SEG)

bibliography

  • 38.0935 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Cordano 1988 14 no. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002411
  • Arena 2002 132 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
